documents.document: I can't get out canvassing at the minute - helping to get a heap of #TogetherForYes posters up seems like the next best thing: https://t.co/ZyseiaAc8n
@daveegan Loooong night ahead here...
@daveegan How are you holding up there Dave? https://t.co/OVxbefm7nJ
@candrews ✔
@brian_donohue @ixd_ncad And maybe build a mobile version while they're at it. My renewal lapsed 3 months ago and I've been scared off renewing it 😱
Pretty gobsmacked to see that this is going on in my hometown, but the shock of it's prompted me to donate another few bob to @Together4yes here: https://t.co/CGGlmpGJaa https://t.co/rV2FIXdVpL
@SarahJayBee It was a No stronghold in 2015 too. Infuriating.
@garyimbibe @Womens_Aid Absolutely deadly news. Best of luck with the rest of the fit out!
@elainajryan The baddies always get the best numbers!
@elainajryan WHAT! Even more conflicted about him now.
This is terrible and also perfect. https://t.co/UXUGnGPhaE
@jmason @damienmulley @_DavidStevens And Instagram (which is where they got me). They are mad comfy though.
@_DavidStevens The ads don't disappear, mind you, and now I'm seriously contemplating a "summer" pair. Am total sucker.
@_DavidStevens I caved. They're amazing.
@dublinbarista Hand grinder + aeropress FTW. Can also supply tiny judge.
RT @RobGMacfarlane: Word(s) of the day: "Laethanta na Riabhaiche", "The Borrowed Days"; the name given in Irish folklore to the first three…
@sweetoblivion26 It's always extra obvious in that particular venue too. Hopefully they're back this way soon...
@sweetoblivion26 That would have driven me mad but I'm still jealous! Favourite album from last year, her voice is amazing.
@orlamcdermott Excira! Will be catching up in the morning, going to have to avoid Twitter til then I think 😅
@msleedy @ailbhe The dream! Been looking for something out west for June so this is an excellently timed tweet 👌
@msleedy WHERE IS THIS PARADISE
Finally snaffled one 🙌 https://t.co/rBIqQ3GYfB
Rest of maternity leave: sorted 👌 https://t.co/nUkpRS7oHD
@neasaconneally I got scolded repeatedly for only buying bin tags (no markup). Good times.
Stoneybatter will never be the same. https://t.co/ZJbPntEYMK
@tweetaoif I very much hope the IRFU and Ulster Rugby reflect on that.
@Judearoo Legend. @LdnIrishARC is a good port of call 👍
@ailis The layers of double standard and injustice are pretty dense alright 😔
@stewartsc @Gimletmedia This is a GENIUS idea. Thank you!
@msleedy And days like today only serve to reinforce that narrative, sadly.
@fionarhw Oh my. :(

@msleedy It's all so depressingly familiar. I'm welling up in my local café - sitting next to a chirpy, chatty group of teen girls and thinking that something like this will probably affect at least one of them.

Almost as upsetting as the verdict itself are all the stories I'm reading of lads in workplaces and on WhatsApp groups, cheering at the outcome and further humiliating the victim. We've got a bigger problem here than just one court case. #IBelieveHer
@lornab79 @blatherina No excuse whatsoever but sure I've nothing else to be at now 😅
The Belfast verdict and the arrogance of Jackson's legal team's statement are absolutely horrifying. Thinking of other survivors who are having to relive their own experiences today. #IBelieveHer
@lornab79 @blatherina Finally gave in and started watching it here and it is GOLD.
@darraghcurran Yay! Looking forward to that here in a couple of weeks. And maybe a *smidge* more sleep. 😅
@darraghcurran Belated congrats! Hope you're all doing well 😊
Super excited for my wonderful Intercomrades today, and for what's yet to come 😊 https://t.co/JjEpvnZZ8w
@Ciara_OC Blas in the Chocolate Factory is lovely if you're D1, or Two Boys Brew if you're a bit further out.
@somaries Dying to catch up on this episode tomorrow!
@susanjharrison @Bodenclothing Snap 🙈
@KateSugrue 😱
@kmossco So familiar. Congrats though! 😊
@somaries @philbuckley So glam. Make sure you get some Ard Bia cake in!
@LooraKennedy This. (With a splash of whiskey added to the icing.) https://t.co/PY0wpvVuce
@MindTheBabyBlog @jillajordan Red mist descending here. The "baby's healthy so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯" narrative is so damaging.
@LisaHannigan https://t.co/y9jb8jzaw6
@adamkmccarthy Withnailesque.
@somaries 😱
Wait, did my kid just draw her first CSAT rating request? They grow up so fast... https://t.co/wKwehQhO4B

@lornab79 "My fingernails owe me money". Absolute gold 😂
@MumagerIE Thanks for taking feedback on board :) will be doing your returner workshop later this year, looking forward to it!
Hooted laughing at this thread and woke the baby. Worth it. https://t.co/8Je3AmFbAE
So... is Bono still a pox?
@MumagerIE The cover on the right. Not all families look like the one on the left.
@sweetoblivion26 Douze points to you! What a thrill!
@TheSineadBurke @BoF @imranamed The fiercest!

@jillajordan There was quite a bit of the latter. Yeesh!

Step 1: open netflix Step 2: click through 500 films Step 3: select tv series Step 4: pick epi…

@sineadcuddihy Laundry basket zero = the new inbox zero.

@garyimbibe Good coffee, but how's the dance class? (We've got an aspiring girl band member here)
@suzybie The four-year-old is about to earn her pocket money pairing socks...
Great Drying, Day 5: am now channelling the mam from Derry Girls and scouring the house for anything and everything washable.
@stewartsc https://t.co/s7NdCbU8Lo
@sineadcuddihy Also not massive fans of coffee anytime I've tested 😓

@geoffreykeating :confusedparrot:
@JuicyLucy Lol, I'm paying for it now 🙈
@hughdurkin Be grand.
@hughdurkin It's just as well they're fierce cute.
It is a truth universally acknowledged that, no matter how long a baby has been asleep, they'll wake the second you take your first sip of tea.
Not a single ice cream van to be found in the Phoenix Park 😢
@EmerTheScreamer Scraped one thumb with opposing thumbnail whilst wrangling small child's scooter. Drew blood, needed plaster 💀
@emjmeehan Don't tempt me! 🙈
Tragic old lady level: considering purchasing a second pair of Mahabis. Send help please 🙏
@emcguane You'll be missed heaps! Please have a Nanaimo bar for me on your return home. ❤
@acarbery Yes please! Holler if you're up this way x
@acarbery So very happy to have you home. ❤

✔ Cast vote ✔ Have cathartic weep ✔ Treat self to enormous coffee and breakfast dessert

Awake with the baby since 4am. Well, she went back to sleep, I couldn't sleep a wink. Let's do this. #repealthe8th #TogetherForYes
@tikkin @andypiper Crikey, what was I tweeting about ten years ago?!
Sixty eight percent. WHAT.
